New Records: Nishan Velupillay scored a goal on his debut for the Socceroos
Pre-Game Insights: China coach Branko Ivankovic stated that his side has played against top teams in Asia and needs to improve to pick up points
Tony Popovic emphasized the importance of the match for the Socceroos
Post-Match Reflections: China coach Branko Ivankovic stated that his side was close to getting a point and needs to keep fighting
Player of the match Craig Goodwin spoke about the importance of playing for the national team
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was attended by a record-breaking crowd of 46,291 at Adelaide Oval
The Socceroos' comeback was crucial in securing a win and keeping their World Cup hopes alive
